title: All the text bugs with all the champion abilities (images included)(Part 2)
body:
http://i.imgur.com/4d4K0EL.png
Aatrox's W has no health loss (due to not having HP for being in client)

http://i.imgur.com/0N1SBXl.png
Ahri's W max damage to a champion is 0

http://i.imgur.com/AKATlfj.png
Draven's Q range is 300

http://i.imgur.com/T9bO8rw.png
Draven's W range is 1000

http://i.imgur.com/fapttSE.png
Ekko's Q should be 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 seconds

http://i.imgur.com/6ASbiam.png
Ekko's R has 2 percentages

http://i.imgur.com/7vUbKxO.png
Ekko's W has 2 percentages

http://i.imgur.com/OY1LKr3.png
Dr. Mundo's E damage is 0 (due to not having HP for being in client)

http://i.imgur.com/ioyTDAq.png
Dr. Mundo's R health regen is 0 (due to not having HP for being in client)

http://i.imgur.com/UFNliFG.png
Elise's Q has 2 percentages

Also Elise has no ability previews of her Spider Form

http://i.imgur.com/csz8Z5j.png
Evelynn's Q should be 1.5 seconds and doesn't indicate the AP Ratio

http://i.imgur.com/ox99nKp.png
Evelynn's W has 10000 range

http://i.imgur.com/DYP4AsD.png
Evelynn's R should only indicate 15/20/25% and the AP Ratio after it. AP Ratio also indicates 0

http://i.imgur.com/FIpaXHH.png
Fiddlestick's W total damage and total AP Ratio is 0

http://i.imgur.com/YrpoOUE.png
Fiddlestick's R total damage and total AP Ratio is 0

http://i.imgur.com/UICPE2j.png
Fiora's E critical chance indicates 0 (due to not having AD for being in client) and it's AD ratio is 0

http://i.imgur.com/D3sThG9.png
Fiora's R has no max health true damage (due to not having the passive's information in client) also has no AD Ratio

http://i.imgur.com/JHivf1b.png
Fizz's W has 600 range

http://i.imgur.com/t7u1Wt5.png
Gangplank's E Cooldown is 0 and the charges are 0. Also Kegs or Barrels health decay is 0 (due to not being in-game)

http://i.imgur.com/Rlub5c3.png
Garen's W has 0 permanent armor and magic resist. Should only indicate how much he can gain.

http://i.imgur.com/dkqtRko.png
Garen's E indicates no AD Ratio and it doesn't say how much he spins (due to not being in-game)

More to come after PBE update.

replies.body: Damn son, that some great work right there. Thank you so much for helping improve the client! Ill make sure that this feedback gets to the right people.
Thank you :) More to come in a few hours.
You seem to missed Xerath's W having a 0% scaling
I'm doing it in alphabetical order so I didn't got Xerath.

Sometimes 0 is top tier, ok?

But in all seriousness, these are great notices, keep up tha good work comrade.
